”Alexa open home cooking”
”Alexa ask home cooking to get recipes with yogurt and strawberries”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: home cooking
des:
You open the fridge and they are still there: a few left-overs that you should be eating. 
What could you possibly cook out of them? Sounds familiar? Home Cooking is here to help you!

Give it a list of ingredients and it will suggest several recipes. 
Choose a recipe and it will guide you through it step by step. 

No more food waste. Creative dishes here we come!

--

Dialog sample:

 User > open Home Cooking
 Alexa > Hello, and welcome back to Home Cooking. What are the ingredients you'd like to use ?

 User > yogurt and strawberries
 Alexa > I found the following recipes.
 Recipe number 1: Strawberry-Basil Yogurt Cooler - Lassi. It uses strawberries and yogurt, but it also requires fresh basil. 
 Recipe number 2: Double-Berry Smoothies. It uses strawberries and yogurt, but it also requires milk. 
 Recipe number 3: Strawberry Yogurt Bruschetta. It uses strawberries and yogurt, but it also requires bagels.

 Which one would you prefer ?

 User > recipe number one
 Alexa > You have chosen Strawberry-Basil Yogurt Cooler - Lassi. 
 This recipe has 2 steps. Say 'okay' to go from one step to the next, or say 'repeat' to hear it again.
 Let's start.

 Step number 1: Whizz all of the ingredients together in blender.

 User > okay
 Alexa > Step number 2: Pour into serving glasses and garnish with small basil leaves.

 User > okay
 Alexa > Congratulations, we are done with this recipe!

--

What to cook understands the following commands:

 "repeat" - to hear again the list of proposed recipes or the current step
 "next" or "okay" - once you are done with the current step, move to the next
 "previous step" - to step back one step
 "new recipe" - to start over with a new recipe
 "start over" - to get back to the first step of current recipe

--

Alexa will only wait for 8 seconds to get an answer.
It will time-out after that, and quit the skill execution.

Home Cooking will always remember where you stand with your current recipe.
When called again, it will continue from where you left it.

--
